evidence.claim: Friends of the Family Home Health Care mentions HIPAA compliance on their security page, emphasizing adherence to health data regulations.
The company uses HL7 standards for health information exchange, facilitating interoperability between healthcare systems.
They offer FHIR APIs for accessing patient health records in a standardized format, enhancing data exchange capabilities.
Integration patterns include the use of EDI X12 transaction sets for billing and claims processing related to health insurance.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions or relevant API automation.
